EnumProperty.Name: DCompiler
EnumProperty.Description: select the compiler. Disable to avoid some changed linker defaults. Apply to switch to the property pages of the selected compiler.

StringListProperty.Name: StringImportPaths
StringListProperty.Description: where to look for string imports.

StringListProperty.Name: VersionIdentifiers
StringListProperty.Description: compile in version code identified by ident/>= level.

StringListProperty.Name: DebugIdentifiers
StringListProperty.Description: compile in debug code identified by ident/<= level.

StringListProperty.Name: ImportCPaths
StringListProperty.Description: where to look for C includes in imported C files.

EnumProperty.Name: CompilationModel
EnumProperty.Description: Compilation model if object file name is empty: project, package or single.

EnumValue.Name: File
EnumValue.DisplayName: One object file per source file

StringProperty.Name: ObjectFileName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the name of the output object file. Leave empty to auto generate a name according to the compilation model. Use [PackageName] to add the folder name with special characters replaced.

BoolProperty.Name: PreserveSourcePath
BoolProperty.Description: preserve source path for output files.

EnumProperty.Name: DRuntimeLibrary
EnumProperty.Description: Link against the given D runtime library. druntime only (without phobos) is only available for LDC.

EnumValue.Name: None
EnumValue.Description: Don't force a specific D run-time library. The library must be explicitly passed to the linker.

EnumValue.Name: Phobos (default)
EnumValue.Description: Causes your application to use the full standard D runtime.

EnumProperty.Name: CRuntimeLibrary
EnumProperty.Description: Link against the static/dynamic debug/release C runtime library.

EnumValue.Name: None
EnumValue.Description: Don't force a specific C run-time library. This needs another project to set the library or the library must be explicitly passed to the linker.

EnumValue.Name: MultiThreaded
EnumValue.Description: Causes your application to use the multithread, static version of the run-time library.

EnumValue.Name: MultiThreadedDebug
EnumValue.Description: This option also causes the compiler to place the library name LIBCMTD.lib into the .obj file so that the linker will use LIBCMTD.lib to resolve external symbols.

EnumValue.Name: MultiThreadedDll
EnumValue.Description: Causes your application to use the multithread- and DLL-specific version of the run-time library. Causes the compiler to place the library name MSVCRT.lib into the .obj file.

EnumValue.Name: MultiThreadedDebugDll
EnumValue.Description: Causes your application to use the debug multithread- and DLL-specific version of the run-time library. It also causes the compiler to place the library name MSVCRTD.lib into the .obj file.

BoolProperty.Name: CompileD_UseMultiToolTask
BoolProperty.Description: Use all available processors to compile the project. Ignored on VS2013 (not supported). Ignored if 'Compilation model' is 'One object file per project'.

BoolProperty.Name: LowMem
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Enable garbage collection for the compiler
BoolProperty.Description: Uses less memory for the compilation at the cost of slower compilation. (-lowmem)

EnumValue.Name: Info
EnumValue.DisplayName: show use of deprecated features as warnings

EnumValue.Name: Error
EnumValue.DisplayName: show use of deprecated features as errors (halt compilation)

BoolProperty.Name: ShowCommandLine
BoolProperty.Description: Show compiler command line

BoolProperty.Name: Verbose
BoolProperty.Description: Print out what the compiler is currently doing. (-v)

BoolProperty.Name: ShowTLS
BoolProperty.Description: list all variables going into thread local storage. (-vtls)

BoolProperty.Name: ShowGC
BoolProperty.Description: list all gc allocations including hidden ones. (-vgc)

BoolProperty.Name: TransitionField
BoolProperty.Description: List all non-mutable fields which occupy an object instance

BoolProperty.Name: TransitionCheckImports
BoolProperty.Description: Give deprecation messages about import anomalies

BoolProperty.Name: TransitionComplex
BoolProperty.Description: Give deprecation messages about all usages of complex or imaginary types

BoolProperty.Name: IgnorePragma
BoolProperty.Description: ignore unsupported pragmas. (-ignore)

BoolProperty.Name: ShowDependencies
BoolProperty.Description: print module dependencies (imports/file/version/debug/lib). (-deps)

BoolProperty.Name: Profile
BoolProperty.Description: profile runtime performance of generated code. (-profile)

BoolProperty.Name: ProfileGC
BoolProperty.Description: profile runtime allocations. (-profile=gc)

BoolProperty.Name: Coverage
BoolProperty.Description: do code coverage analysis. (-cov)

IntProperty.Name: MinCoverage
IntProperty.Description: require at least nnn% code coverage. (-cov=nnn)

BoolProperty.Name: Unittest
BoolProperty.Description: compile in unit tests.

BoolProperty.Name: Optimizer
BoolProperty.Description: run optimzer.

BoolProperty.Name: Inliner
BoolProperty.Description: do function inlining.

BoolProperty.Name: StackFrame
BoolProperty.Description: always emit stack frame.

BoolProperty.Name: StackStomp
BoolProperty.Description: add stack stomp code.

BoolProperty.Name: AllInst
BoolProperty.Description: generate code for all template instantiations.

BoolProperty.Name: Main
BoolProperty.Description: add default main() (e.g. for unittesting).

EnumValue.Name: baseline
EnumValue.DisplayName: default architecture as determined by target

EnumValue.Name: native
EnumValue.DisplayName: CPU architecture that this compiler is running on

BoolProperty.Name: DebugFull
BoolProperty.Description: when generating debug info emit it for all referenced types.

BoolProperty.Name: EnableDebugMixin
BoolProperty.Description: expand and save mixins to specified file. (dmd 2.084.1)

StringProperty.Name: DebugMixin
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the name of the mixin debug file if mixin debugging is enabled. Leave empty to auto generate a name according to the compilation model. Use [PackageName] to add the folder name with special characters replaced.

BoolProperty.Name: PerformSyntaxCheckOnly
BoolProperty.Description: Performs a syntax check only.

BoolProperty.Name: BetterC
BoolProperty.Description: omit generating some runtime information and helper functions.

BoolProperty.Name: DIP25
BoolProperty.Description: implement DIP25: sealed pointers. (dmd 2.067+)

BoolProperty.Name: DIP1000
BoolProperty.Description: implement DIP1000: scoped pointers. (dmd 2.073+)

BoolProperty.Name: DIP1008
BoolProperty.Description: implement DIP1008: reference counted exceptions. (dmd 2.078+)

BoolProperty.Name: DIP1021
BoolProperty.Description: implement DIP1021: mutable function arguments. (dmd 2.089+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewFieldwise
BoolProperty.Description: use fieldwise comparisons for struct equality. (dmd 2.085+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewDtorFields
BoolProperty.Description: destruct fields of partially constructed objects. (dmd 2.085+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewIntPromote
BoolProperty.Description: fix integral promotions for unary + - ~ operators. (dmd 2.085+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewFixAliasThis
BoolProperty.Description: when a symbol is resolved, check alias this scope before upper scopes. (dmd 2.085+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewRvalueRefParam
BoolProperty.Description: enable rvalue arguments to ref parameters. (dmd 2.087+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewNoSharedAccess
BoolProperty.Description: disable access to shared memory objects. (dmd 2.088+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewIn
BoolProperty.Description: 'in' on parameters means `scope const [ref]` (dmd 2.092+) and accepts rvalues (dmd 2.094+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewInclusiveInContracts
BoolProperty.Description: 'in' contracts of overridden methods must be a superset of parent contract (dmd 2.095+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewShortenedMethods
BoolProperty.Description: allow use of => for methods and top-level functions in addition to lambdas (dmd 2.101+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewFixImmutableConv
BoolProperty.Description: disallow unsound immutable conversions that were formerly incorrectly permitted (dmd 2.101+)

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewSystemVariables
BoolProperty.Description: disable access to variables marked '@system' from @safe code (dmd 2.102+)

BoolProperty.Name: RevertImport
BoolProperty.Description: revert to single phase name lookup. (dmd 2.085+)

StringProperty.Name: DocDir
StringProperty.Description: write documentation file(s) to this directory.

BoolProperty.Name: PreviewMarkdown
BoolProperty.Description: Enable Markdown replacements in Ddoc. (dmd 2.085+)

BoolProperty.Name: TransitionVMarkdown
BoolProperty.Description: List instances of Markdown replacements in Ddoc. (dmd 2.085+)

StringProperty.Name: DepFile
StringProperty.Description: write module dependencies to filename (only imports).

StringProperty.Name: JSONFile
StringProperty.Description: write browse information to this JSON file.

EnumValue.Name: 32BitsMS-COFF
EnumValue.DisplayName: Generate 32 bit code and write MS-COFF object files

DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Specifies the targets for the build customization to run before.
